about_the_game:
Directed by: Geoff Marslett
Written by: Geoff Marslett
Starring: Kelly Dunn, Francisco Barreiro, Ashley Rae Spillers

Allie leads an unfocused life with no job and a lame boyfriend. So it's no surprise when she hops on the next bus (actually an RV full of karate rockers) to Texas after being attacked on the streets of New York. Seeming to improve as she settles into the slower-pace of Austin, her fears continue to haunt her. She quickly falls into Texas gun culture as a means to feel safe. She walks the fine line between reasonable self-preservation and paranoid withdrawal. Can she maintain healthy relationships, or will the weapons she uses to protect herself cause her problems worse that the ones she was fleeing?

short_description: Loves Her Gun is a romantic tragedy about a young woman who flees violence in New York for the laid back environment in central Texas. Once she settles into Austin she falls into the local gun culture and some of her same worries come back to haunt her.
